helpgrid.innerhtml: Consultant users can log in to one or more tenants to provide consultancy services such as database administration, configuration, and integration services. You specify that a user is a consultant in the Login information for the user.
Select tenants that the consultant user can access to provide services. You must register tenants in the Tenants application before you can assign a consultant to them.

Consultant users can log in to one or more tenants to provide consultancy services such as database administration, configuration, and integration services. You specify that a user is a consultant in the Login information for the user.
The selected consultant user can log in to these tenants. Click Select Tenants if you want to associate additional tenants with this consultant user.
